TopicTitle: Leviathan - The Egg Surprise / Massive Exploration Platform Rover Monster

Articles.Content:
So I thought, why not make a >60 ton rover, take it to Duna and then show it to you? And you know what: It actually has some cool features, like a ramp with a smaller rover and another of my Ion Bikes.

For the ramp I used a bearing I made out of stock parts and monoprop engines to get it back up into the cargo bay. No docking ports or grappling hooks to get it back together with the main craft because then the bearing would clip through the other parts and would no longer work. But if you close the cargo bay, it stays in place ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jVtZ9V1RIg0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/iNDv7)

Try it out here: [http://www./download/jap062bg8a03t7t/Leviathan_II.craft](http://www./download/jap062bg8a03t7t/Leviathan_II.craft)

Thanks. It kind of evolved from me wanting to do some kind of ramp with a stock bearing and kind of exponentially expanded from there ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
